alert.note: Alert for Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 6:02PM CDT until August 29 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Madison County in northwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 602 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Elkins, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Huntsville... Elkins... Hindsville... Withrow Springs State Park... Clifty... Goshen... Mayfield... Best... Sonora... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
